meanings.definition: Having the texture or consistency of fudge.
meanings.sent1: The brownies were the fudgiest treats at the bake sale.
meanings.sent2: She loved the fudgiest part of the cake.
meanings.sent3: The fudgiest ice cream melted quickly in the sun.
meanings.sent4: His voice was the fudgiest, smooth and rich like chocolate.
meanings.sent5: The fudgiest pudding was a hit at the party.

meanings.sent1: This is the fudgiest brownie I have ever tasted!
meanings.sent2: The fudgiest dessert on the menu was irresistible.
meanings.sent3: The fudgiest dog in the park loved rolling in mud.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was the fudgiest sound in the room.
meanings.sent5: The fudgiest blanket kept her warm on cold nights.
